name: stot-ub
description: Secure and Transparent Organ Transportation system using UAVs and blockchain technology

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:blockchain" "npm run dev:simulation"
scripts.install:workspaces: npm install --workspace=blockchain && npm install --workspace=backend && npm install --workspace=frontend && npm install --workspace=simulation
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:blockchain
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:blockchain

author: STOT-UB Team
